availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph H. Davis (Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Davis and Mary Davis. Farmer in Livingston County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as 2nd Lieutenant from August 20, 1861 to January 25, 1863. Promoted to 1st Lieutenant on January 25, 1863. Resigned on August 5, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland/District 2, p. 248.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0211.
